mapper.insert: insert into fire_renovation_record (id, address, acreage, nature, property_owner, property_owner_tel, proposer, proposer_tel, decoration_method, start_time, end_time, responsible_person, responsible_person_tel, "is_ fire", is_fire_facilities, create_time, logic_remove, description, remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acreage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propertyOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propertyOwnerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proposer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proposerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decorationMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{responsiblePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsiblePersonTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFire,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isFireFacilities,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logicRemove,jdbcType=BIT}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

id,
address,

mapper.update:
UPDATE fire_renovation_record set logic_remove =1 where id IN
#{id}

UPDATE fire_renovation_record
address= #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acreage= #{acreage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
nature= #{nature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
property_owner= #{propertyOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
property_owner_tel= #{propertyOwnerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proposer= #{proposer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proposer_tel= #{proposerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decoration_method= #{decorationMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
responsible_person= #{responsiblePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
responsible_person_tel= #{responsiblePersonTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_fire= #{isFire,jdbcType=BIT},
is_fire_facilities= #{isFireFacilities,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time= #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
logic_remove= #{logicRemove,jdbcType=BIT},
description= #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
remark= #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
WHERE logic_remove = 0 AND id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT id,address,nature,property_owner AS propertyOwner,property_owner_tel AS propertyOwnerTel, proposer,proposer_tel AS proposerTel,decoration_method AS decorationMethod,start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime,description,responsible_person AS responsiblePerson,responsible_person_tel AS responsibleTel, remark,`is_fire` AS isFire,is_fire_facilities AS isFireFacilities,create_time AS createTime FROM fire_renovation_record WHERE logic_remove=0 AND id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
